title: ABR VisAsset
description: A visualization asset (VisAsset) for the Artifact-Based Rendering engine

artifactData.description: File names which store the actual VisAsset's data

class.description: High-level descriptor of the artifact (e.g. 'point' glyph or 'divergent' colormap)

family.description: Low-level descriptor of the artifact (e.g. 'haiku' glyph or 'Blue' colormap)

preview.description: File name for the thumbnail icon for this VisAsset

type.description: Type of VisAsset; DOES NOT directly correspond to names in ABR!

artist.description: Name of the artist who created this VisAsset

hidden.description: Should this VisAsset be hidden in the Library or not?

tags.description: List of tags to associate this VisAsset with

colormap.description: Relative path of the colormap definition file, usually 'colormap.xml'

lods.description: List of levels of detail on this glyph

mesh.description: Relative path to OBJ mesh for this level of detail

normal.description: Relative path to normal map PNG for this level of detail

horizontal.description: Relative path to the horizontal cutout texture to use (usually 'horizontal.png')

vertical.description: Relative path to the vertical cutout texture to use (usually 'vertical.png')

image.description: Relative path to the image to use for the texture (usually 'texturemap_0.png')

normalmap.description: Relative path to the image to use for the normal map (usually 'normalmap_0.png')
